column4: does anyone know how to get ipw2200 wireless working in breezy
are you _positive_ you have IPW hardware in it?
next time please use pastebin as I asked
do you have multiple network adapters in that computer?
yes, it looks like you'll have to do something similar, because your acpi config (hardware) is not assigning required resources to the ipw2000bg chipset
no, you don't _have_ to use the bios. Just unload the driver for your wired LAN controller.
